description:
Made in a week for Prototype Studio at NYU Spring 2020.

Prototype #9: Feelings (Concern)

Use WASD keys to walk and mouse to look around. 

Hold right click to zoom.

Visual art assets:

Berezki by Gregory Khodyrev and Low Poly Gameboy Advance SP by Niklas Glosen found on sketchfab.

2D background from Mother 3.

Additonal art assets found on turbosquid and mixamo.

Sound/Music:

Sound taken from the short film The Story of Ones directed by Phạm Ngọc Lân

Người Tình Mùa Đông covered by Ánh Minh

Additional sounds found on freesounds.
